column4: Check clients' needs from time to time until they move out from the dining area as per SOPs. Crumb table as per standard operating procedure. Remove side plates and knives from the table as per SOPs. Remove condiments/shakers and other soiled items from the table as per SOPs Replace ashtrays as per SOPs. Ask additional requests politely from clients as per SOPs. Check clients' needs from time to time until they move out from the dining area as per SOPs. Observe/apply safety measures in setting-up and clearing the area throughout the activity.
